summary: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.
cast: Drew Barrymore|Jim Breuer|Ken Hudson Campbell|Thomas A. Chantler|Tsai Chin|Elaine A. Clark|Roy Conrad|Jim Cummings|Matt Damon|Janeane Garofalo|Leslie Hedger|Roger Jackson|David L. Lander|Nathan Lane|John Leguizamo|Alex D. Linz|Tone Loc|Shannon Orrock|Alex Pels|Ron Perlman|Bill Pullman|Charles Rocket|Crystal Scales|Christopher Scarabosio|Eric Schniewind|Stephen Stanton|Scott Seymann
title: Titan A.E.
